title: Purchasable Huds
body: Im just wondering if anyone knows if RIOT has ever considered or is considering creating custom huds we can purchase in game for example different champion themed or pro team themed huds at all? Maybe a poro or baron themed one etc.

replies.body: I'd legit pay so much for a TSM in game hud
Or just get them free off the internet.

But they aren't in game, unless you are talking about going into the files and completely changing the images to others, which you need to get software to format and the actual images no one has made templates for let alone custom huds. So yeah. Get them for about 20 bucks for the software required to make one on your own.

Or how about not waste a week of your life and listen to this guys idea? He isn't talking about stream overlays, he is talking about huds that you can buy with RP that would change your IN GAME hud. Changing the announcer voice is one thing, but changing the hud requires experience in coding, file formats and photoshop. Not exactly what the everyday player can accomplish.

leaguecraft.com/uimods/

You really didnt even attempt to think about googling it did you.

It was literally the first link too.

I would like you to look at the available uis. They are third party, not League related and are soon to be outdated, not to mention some are poor quality. He is asking if Riot could make custom uis that you can buy that are officially created and maybe even display on your loading card that you have one. Not a mod you have to install.

"unless you are talking about going into the files and completely changing the images to others, which you need to get software to format and the actual images no one has made templates for let alone custom huds"

if u made them yourself and changed the coding wouldnt that be a "hack"

Because of the fact that no one else will see your HUD but you, they'll still find that people are just using free ones from the internet.
The only reasons skins sell well still are because enemies and allies see the skins you use, if you were the only one who could see the skins, you'd find players would just use custom skins.

You can always get them off the internet. It's not that hard to change the hud, all you have to do is download a hud and change the hud in the league of legends folder. Incase something goes wrong just make a backup of the original hud.

orrrr riot can focus on not wasting ours and their time on making their actual game better. in terms of money VS time they'd get more out of just more chroma packs anyway than wasting all that time fiddling with delicate stuff that could end up being game breaking, like if your HUD just disappeared cos theres a bug or something
